definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
erhua variant of 努嘴[nu3 zui3]
to persuade using all possible arguments (idiom); to act good cop and bad cop in turn
to give sb a meaningful look
lit. light mouth, thin tongue (idiom); hasty and rude/caustic and sharp-tongued
to comply in order to please others/to accommodate sb else's taste/to make fun of
lit. standing in front of the King of Hell is easy, but smaller devils are difficult to deal with (idiom)
pinyin: Yan2 wang2 hao3 jian4 , xiao3 gui3 nan2 dang1

definition: lit. on hearing wind, to say rain/to agree uncritically with whatever people say/to parrot other people's words/to chime in with others
pinyin: ting1 jian4 feng1 jiu4 shi4 yu3
